rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open plan living area with Scandinavian minimalist design, large windows for natural light, integrated with the kitchen.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen connected to the living area. Equipped with energy-efficient appliances and ample storage; designed for a minimalist Scandinavian aesthetic.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom emphasizing natural light through large windows. Fitted with built-in wardrobes following Vastu guidelines and ensuring proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room designed with a Scandinavian style, optimizing natural light and using eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Compact study area or home office with ample window space to maintain connection with the garden while ensuring privacy.

openings.description: Large south-facing windows to maximize natural light, aligning with Vastu principles.
Scandinavian-style door made from sustainable wood, designed for security and aesthetic appeal.
Eastern exposure window to invite the morning light as per Vastu guidelines.
